github_user: User account at github.com, e.g. 'indigo-dc' in https://github.com/indigo-dc
description: A short description of the project.
dockerhub_user: User account at hub.docker.com, e.g. 'vykozlov' in https://hub.docker.com/u/vykozlov
docker_baseimage: Base docker image for Dockerfile, e.g. tensorflow/tensorflow:1.7.0
